mapper.select: SELECT A.REV_NUM , A.PEN_ID , A.USER_ID , C.USER_NAME , A.USER_TYPE , A.REV_TITLE , A.REV_CONTENT , A.REV_STAR , A.REV_DATE , A.REPLY , A.ANS_CONTENT , A.ANS_DATE , B.IMAGE FROM REVIEW A LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT REV_NUM, group_concat(REV_IMAGE SEPARATOR ',') IMAGE FROM REVIEW_ATTACH GROUP BY REV_NUM) B ON A.REV_NUM = B.REV_NUM JOIN MEMBER C ON A.USER_ID = C.USER_ID AND A.USER_TYPE = C.USER_TYPE WHERE A.PEN_ID = #{pen_id};
SELECT ROUND(AVG(REV_STAR), 1) 'AVG' , COUNT(REV_NUM) 'R_COUNT' , SUM(IF(REPLY = 'Y', 1, 0)) 'A_COUNT' FROM REVIEW WHERE PEN_ID = #{pen_id};
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO REVIEW_ATTACH VALUES ( (SELECT MAX(REV_NUM) + 1 AS REV_NUM FROM REVIEW) , #{filename})
